Ozara, Oru West bụ obodo dị na Oru West Local Government Area nke Imo State, Nigeria
O nwere obodo asaa, ya bụ: Umuogu, Umuokporoma, Umuezike, Umuobioma, Etitilabu, Ubahalanuwam, na Aboh
Umuogu bụ obodo tochara ndị ọzọ na Ozara, ma nke kacha nta bụ Aboh Ozara
O nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị atọ, nke bụ Town School, Central School, na Aboh Primary School
Ozara nwere ọtụtụ ụka Ndị Kraịst, nke a ma ama n'etiti ha bụ St Patrick Catholic Parish
A na akó na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na ya dị puku mmadụ atọ
Obodo ndị gbara Ozara gburugburu bụ Ohakpu, Amorka, Egbuoma na Mgbidi
Ọ dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Imo Steeti na ókèala ya na Anambra Steeti.

Ụfọdụ aha ndekọ ama ama na Ozara gụnyere Chief Aloysius Obodoako (Atlanta, Georgia USA), Late Barrister Kingsley Uzochukwu Anene, Chief Livinus Ezeugo Onyirimba, Late Mr Fidelis Chukwuati Anyikire, onye nwụrụ anwụ Mr D.N.C Ogbaji, Chief Gregory Eze Okafor, Sir Lawrence Anyikire, Mr Chibueze Anyikire, Godwin Ugochukwu, onye nwụrụ nwụrụ anwụ Nze K.C

Chukwu, Dr., Onye isi ụlọ nyocha, Michael Oken, Michael Oden, Okenken, Maazù On On On On, James Okenkenkenken, Onye isi ụlọ ọgwụ, Maazine, Maazide, Maazị On On Onki, Maazite Oken, Mahadum On On Onk, Maaziri, Maazịrị, Maazir, Maazina, Maazimi, Maazisi On On Onke, Maazin On On Onzi On On Onik, Maazik, Mahadik, Mazi On On, Maazit, Maazọ Ọk, Mahadki, Mahad Ozara nwere otu onye ọchịchị ọdịnala a họpụtara - Jonas Ahize na onye gọọmentị steeti Imo họpụtara Onyaka Ononuju.
Onye isi oche nke otu obodo-(OPU) bụ Maazị Peter Anonyio
Ozara nwere ahịa obodo a na-akpọ Orie Ozara nke na-ewere ọnọdụ ụbọchị anọ ọ bụla n'izu

Ọrụ ndị isi nke ndị Ozara bụ ọrụ ugbo na azụmaahịa.
Nze Kevin Chukwudire Umenyido-Ebochukwu nke Umuobioma bụ onye nkuzi mbụ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ozara, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Government College Umuahia a ma ama
Ndị Ozara site na mgbalị onwe ha wuru ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị atọ ya bụ Ozara Central Primary School, Ozara Town School na Aboh Primary School

Otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ, Comprehensive Secondary School dị na Ubahalanuwam, ụlọ ọrụ ahụike, ọrụ ọkụ eletrik na atụmatụ maka ọrụ okporo ụzọ tupu asọmpi ọjọọ maka onye ọchịchị ọdịnala nke were ọtụtụ afọ laghachi ha azụ.
Ozara nwere ala tebụl nwere ọtụtụ nkwụ dị elu.
